Rulings.Base: 1. This effect targets 1 monster your opponent controls. It can even target face-down monsters.\n2. You destroy the monster and inflict damage at the same time.\n3. The damage dealt is half of the ATK of the monster while it was on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, no damage is dealt.
